thread.title: Beyoncé and Jay-Z Jump on DJ Khaled’s New Track “Shining”
thread.title_full: Beyoncé and Jay-Z Jump on DJ Khaled’s New Track “Shining”

author: Jacob Davey
title: Beyoncé and Jay-Z Jump on DJ Khaled’s New Track “Shining”
text:
DJ Khaled has dropped a triumphant new song, “Shining”, featuring none other than Beyoncé and Jay Z. The song was released fresh off the back of the 2017 Grammys, where Bey absolutely slayed a live performance of “Love Drought” and “Sandcastles”, alongside picking up several awards including Best Urban Contemporary Album for Lemonade . DJ Khaled’s Major Key lost out to Chance the Rapper’s Coloring Book for Best Rap Album, but Khaled ensured he stayed winning by featuring music’s biggest power couple on a track “He’s been waiting his whole life” to make.
DJ KHALED "SHINING" FT @Beyonce & @S_C_ #GRATEFUL pic.twitter.com/u5x4AlAv1J 
— DJ KHALED (@djkhaled) February 13, 2017 

The artwork for the single features DJ Khaled’s recently born son, Asahd Tuck Khaled. Jay Z notably references 21 Savage, “21 Grammys I’m a savage n*gga”, and unleashed some bars which have been argued as being indirect Drake disses ““I know y’all ain’t out here talking numbers, right? I know y’all ain’t out here talking summers, right? I know you walkin’ round, talking down/Saying boss shit when you a runner, right?” Take a listen for yourself and see what you think below.

This is the first time Beyonce and Jay Z have linked up on a track since “Drunk In Love” back in 2013. You can watch Beyonce and all the best of the action from the 2017 Grammys here .
